member.name: M:Library.API.Controllers.BooksController.GetBooks(System.Guid)
member.summary: Get a book by Author Id
member.returns: An action result of type book.

member.name: M:Library.API.Controllers.BooksController.GetBook(System.Guid,System.Guid)
member.summary: Get the book by Book Id and Author Id.
member.returns: Ac action result type of book with Author first name and last name.
